item.title: New Russian School
item.description: My goal in this project was to design a completely new building for the Russian School of Austin. Follow along with me in my journey through the world of architecture as I sketch, plan, and model a building from the ground up.

item.title: Bitwise Operators and Bitboards
item.description: Bitwise Operators and Bitboards is an interactive presentation about the importance of bitwise operators, and demonstrates one application of them: bitboards. The presentation is intended for those new to low-level programming and can be presented in about 15 minutes.
